alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 21 at 3:12PM HST until January 22 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI... .A large west-northwest (280-300 degrees) is very slow to ease this afternoon, so the warnings and advisory are extended through tonight. Surf heights should dip to advisory levels by Monday morning as the swell lowers. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 8 to 12 feet. * WHERE...West facing shores of Lanai. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
